replies.body:
Dont really know apollo cus Im not in the team and I haven't been in the team either. Youre a good team but I feel like they've actually been getting quite a bit  worse than before. I dont really know why this happened but I guess it's because Budah and Lego quit. I also feel like they probably will 'rise'  again as there's still alot of people who wants to join the team.

I like talking to you and I like that you left apollo xxdxd. You probably find me annoying sometimes qhich I know alot of people do. You're a good pvper and a nice person and you've improved alot lately aswell. You are an amazing defender, probabl one of the best I know. I dont rlly know but it feels like you are able to play other positions apart from defense aswell. Im honest, I dont think I have anything bad to tell you. Nice person <3

I dont rlly know but it feels like you are able to play other positions apart from defense aswell. Im honest, I dont think I have anything bad to tell you. Nice person <3

replies.body:
I will answer both questions in 1

You're a nice guy, could be annoying sometimes but I dont rlly mind it as Im annoying too. Your english is incredibly good for being a german. You are a decent pvper but I feel like you still have alot to improve. Ofc there's always something to improve and you have a long way still so work hard :)
I dont really know what to say more as we dont talk that much but I guess you're nice etc :)

replies.body:
Tbh you are quite annoying. You keep apolying for teams even if you're banned and you're also lying about stuff. For example, if you want to be in a good team there's no point lying your way into it. Do not say you were ina team you havent even had your feet on. Be honest and play with a team that fits you. 
You're not that good at following instructions and listening to the team leaders. You say you have tons of more experience than you actually do. You're a little more than average at pvp.

replies.body:
One of my best friends on avicus atm. You're really fun to talk to and you're a great leader. I remember before when we used to lose like every single scrim against jala and then I thought that you were a slightly bad leader because we always won when xtra lead. No offense, pls dont start hating me i sill love u.

Sorry I dont like onions

This team is actually amazing. At the beggining I never thought this was even going to become something. The team has improved alot and we're getting better and better. I love the scrims and the members in the team. 

Before when celestial was a fairly new team I thought you were more of an average player. Since that you've been improving alot but I'd actually say that you have a long way to go which I actually do aswell. I'd say 6-7/10
